1131980.name: foreverloops STUDIO
1131980.description:
foreverloops STUDIO: everything foreverloops has to offer, plus

  • VST3 support
  • ASIO support
  • SPOUT sender capability
  • MIDI output capability

foreverloops STUDIO ships with additional samples (to a total of more than 350) and more effects.

Versions:

    foreverloops BEATS        foreverloops LONGPLAY       foreverloops STUDIO   
      not upgradeable     upgradable to STUDIO      DLC for LONGPLAY
unlimited tracks                 •                 •                 •
import audio, video, images                 •                 •                 •
drive gears                 •                 •                 •
sequencer gears                 •                 •                 •
scratch gears                 •                 •
MIDI gears                 •                 •
FX gears                 •                 •
included samples                 270                 339                 386
on-screen keyboard                 •                 •
Leibniz drives                 •                 •
ASIO support                 •
MIDI out                 •
Spout sender                 •
VST3 support                 •
included effects                 18                 18+13

foreverloops is promoted by aws impulse XL of BMWFW processed by aws.
1131980.supported_languages: 英语, 德语, 法语, 意大利语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 简体中文, 日语, 韩语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 俄语
